title.rendered: Amazon Account Management with John Cavendish of Seller Candy

content.rendered:
Podcast: Play in new window | Download (Duration: 24:47 — 22.7MB)

Subscribe: Spotify | Email | RSS

Podcast (10k-podcast): Play in new window | Download (Duration: 41:08 — 37.7MB)

Subscribe: Spotify | Email | TuneIn | RSS

Amazon Account Management

with John Cavendish of Seller Candy

You’ll Learn

  • The problem with hiring cheap staff to handle Seller Central tasks
  • Why you don’t need someone who understands your business deeply to do tactical Seller Central tasks
  • Why you also don’t need someone full-time or working exclusively for you
  • What John’s staff find on Account audits
  • Why it’s important to monitor listings
  • Buy box suppression
  •  How to use Flat Files to back up your listings (this could save a lot of headaches)
  • Update on FBA shipment and order handling

Next Steps

To work with John just go to sellercandy.com or email John@sellercandy.com

Mention “Amazing FBA” – pro package $100 discount

Other interviews with John

Coronavirus for Amazon Sellers
